data.title: Sangeeta Srivastava Bio : Here's Everything You Need To Know
data.meta_description: Sangeeta Srivastava was an Indian model and actor of Indian television. She is known for working in some of the popular Hindi daily soaps.
data.text:
Sangeeta Srivastava was an Indian actress and model. She was known for working in some of the most popular daily soaps. Iss Pyar Ko Kya Dun. The year 2020 has not been very kind to any of us and even for the entertainment industry. The TV industry and bollywood has lost some of the amazing artists in past few months. From Irfan Khan to Sushant Singh Rajput every demise has turned down the whole industry. Now, the industry has lost another gem Sangeeta Srivastava who was a part of Barun Sobti and Sanaya Irani show - Iss Pyaar Ko Kya Naam Doon.

Life of Sangeeta Srivastava

Sangeeta was suffering from disease called Vasculitis, an auto immune disease. She was admitted to the hospital - Kokilaben Hospital. Doctors said she was responding well for the treatment. The prolong use of steroid has taken a toll on her body. Sangeeta was a brilliant actress, apart from Hindi TV serials, she was quite popular among the theatre lovers. She aged only 37 year old, she was born in Pune and belonged to Hindu religion.

Educational Qualification

She graduated from Nowrosjee Wadia College, Pune.

Family and Relationship

She was married and had no siblings.

Interesting Facts

Sangeeta Srivastava also worked in Thapki Pyaar Ki and Bhanwar, among others TV serials.
